title: 美國參議院通過拜登槍械管制法案

replies.msg:
Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer on Thursday vowed that the Senate would vote on the Bipartisan Background Checks Act of 2021, which passed the House Thursday in a 227-203 vote.

The US House of Reps just PASSED Biden-pushed gun control.

🚨PASSED banning private transfers
🚨PASSED giving govt bureaucrats power to indefinitely delay gun sales

We said it during the election & we’ll say it again: Biden wants to DISMANTLE the 2nd Amendment.



買槍要背景審查，但總統投票就唔洗，民主黨真係好野
美國憲法就係俾依班披住共產主義皮既民主黨人摧毀

有槍都冇撚用啦
班垃圾白鬼都唔反抗
俾啲黑鬼殺曬就啱
